issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `StartGame(string,string)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
In the function `Guess(string)` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to msg.sender.

There is a check on storage index 0. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `StartGame(string,string)`.
issues.title: Ether send

issues.description:
